H0.text: Who is the famous brother of Emilio Estevez. Charlie Sheen

H1.text: Who is the famous brother of Emilio Estevez. Ramón Estevez

H2.text: Who is the famous brother of Emilio Estevez. Martin Sheen

H3.text: Who is the famous brother of Emilio Estevez. WINNING!

A4.text: He has two older brothers, Emilio and Ramon, and a younger sister, Renée, all actors.

A5.text: Sheen followed in the footsteps of his father Martin Sheen in becoming an actor.
